parameters.name: EnableTagAuth
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable tag verification.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The keyword that can be specified in the name of the API group.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 50. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description:
The order. Valid values: asc and desc. Default value: desc.

*   asc: The API groups are displayed in ascending order of modification time.
*   desc: The API groups are displayed in descending order of modification time.
